description_0: An overhead view of a light blue chalk drawing of a square, in the square are multiple smaller shapes drawn and colored in with chalk. There are three rows of three smaller shapes in the square, the shapes are either yellow squares, red triangles, or orange circles. The top row from left to right is a circle, a square, and a triangle. The middle row from left to right is a triangle, a square, and a circle. The bottom row from left to right is a square, a circle, and a triangle. There is a white chalk line visible in the top right corner of the image, and the side of a light blue square visible on the left side of the image. There is a leaf on the top right quadrant of the square and a leaf next to the top right corner outside of the square.
description_1: The top-down view of a white chalk drawing of a box with a red square two orange circles three purple squares and two green triangles on the inside. The bottom left of the box is not connected, leaving a small gap. The red square is in the upper left corner of the box. The orange circles are in the center top and center bottom of the box. Purple squares are aligned from the bottom left corner to the top right corner, splitting the two orange circles. The two green triangles are in the lower right corner of the box, the left one pointing upwards and the right one pointing downwards. The downward pointing triangle is slightly higher. The concrete surface under the chalk drawing the scattered with dark stains. Daytime.
